get.description: This API fetches a single template using the given templateId

patch.description: Updates an existing Agent Room template.

post.description: Creates a new template for the Agent Room

get.description: This API fetches all templates created by the user

post.description: This API associates a template with the given templateId

x-custom-parameters-attributes.description: The starting index number from which the Agent Room templates should be fetched.
Number of requests to list. The default value is 10 and the maximum value supported is 100.
ID of the module to which the Agent Room template belong.
Name of the page to which the Agent Room template belong. The allowed values are: detail
to get parsed json from canvas
to get parsed, unparsed and layout response
Name of the modules from which the template must be fetched. Values allowed are tickets
